channel_id.title: Channel ID
channel_id.description: The Kolibri channel ID that you want to scrape

root_id.title: Root ID
root_id.description: The node ID (usually Topic) from where to start the scraper. Defaults to the root of the channel.

lang.title: Language
lang.description: ISO-639-3 (3 chars) language code of content. If unspecified, will attempt to detect from main page, or use 'eng'

name.title: Name
name.description: ZIM name. Used as identifier and filename (date will be appended)

title.title: Title
title.description: Custom title for your ZIM. Kolibri channel name otherwise

description.title: Description
description.description: Custom description for your ZIM. Kolibri channel description otherwise

long_description.title: Long description
long_description.description: Custom long description for your ZIM. Kolibri channel description otherwise

favicon.title: Favicon
favicon.description: Custom Favicon for your ZIM. Kolibri channel thumbnail otherwise

css.title: Custom CSS
css.description: URL to a single CSS file to be included in all pages (but not on kolibri-html-content ones). Inlude external resources using data URL.

about.title: Custom About
about.description: URL to a single HTML file to use as an about page. Place everythong inside `body .container` (including stylesheets and scripts) as only this and your <title> will be merged into the actual about page. Remember to include images inline using data URL.

creator.title: Content Creator
creator.description: Name of content creator. Kolibri channel author or 'Kolibri' otherwise

tags.title: ZIM Tags
tags.description: List of comma-separated Tags for the ZIM file. 'category:other, kolibri, and _videos:yes' added automatically

use_webm.title: Use WebM
use_webm.description: Kolibri videos are in mp4. Choosing webm will require videos to be re-encoded. Result will be slightly smaller and of lower quality. WebM support is bundled in the ZIM so videos will be playable on every platform.

low_quality.title: Low quality
low_quality.description: Uses only the 'low_res' version of videos if available. If not, recompresses using agressive compression.

autoplay.title: Autoplay
autoplay.description: Enable autoplay on video and audio articles. Behavior differs on platforms/browsers.

output.title: Output folder
output.description: Output folder for ZIM file(s). Leave it as '/output'

tmp_dir.title: Temp folder
tmp_dir.description: Where to create temporay build folder. Leave it as '/output'

zim_file.title: ZIM filename
zim_file.description: ZIM file name (based on --name if not provided). Include {period} to insert date period dynamically

threads.title: Threads
threads.description: Number of threads to use to handle nodes concurrently. Increase to speed-up I/O operations (disk, network). Default: 1

processes.title: Processes
processes.description: Number of processes to dedicate to media optimizations. Default: 1

optimization_cache.title: Optimization Cache URL
optimization_cache.description: S3 Storage URL including credentials and bucket
